Model
Brand: MSI
Model: MAG FORGE 100M


Details
Type: ATX Mid Tower
Color: Black
Case Material: ABS Plastic / SPCC Steel / Tempered Glass
With Power Supply: No

LED: RGB
Dust Filters: Bottom / Top

Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: 2 x USB 3.2 Gen1 Type-A / 1 x HD Audio / 1 x Mic


Cooling System
Fan Options: Front: 3 x 120 mm (2 x 120 mm RGB LED Fan included) / 2 x 140 mmTop: 2 x 120 mm / 2 x 140 mmRear: 1 x 120 mm (1 x 120mm System Fan included)
Radiator Options: Front: Up to 240 mmTop: Up to 240 mmRear: Up to 120mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 330 mm
Max CPU Cooler Height: 160 mm
Max PSU Length: Standard ATX 160 mm, max to 200 mm (without 3.5" HDD case installed)
Dimensions (H x W x D): 19.53" x 8.27" x 17.05"
Weight: 12.43 lbs.


Additional Info
